TopicTitle: (I Don't Know Where to Post This) Discord Account Hacked, Kicked Out of Every Discord Server (KSP)

Articles.Content:
Hello There! You may know me as Phoenix RL#1055 on discord on multiple servers, including the CKAN Discord, Matt Lowney's Discord, Piolet's Discord, The Official Galaxies unknown server and the official KSP reddit server. Recently a hacker by the name of 'deX' hacked into my account, and spam posted CSGO trade requests on every server and DM. Heck, I dont even LIKE CSGO. If anyone reading this is the owner or moderator of these server's pls unban me and help me get this 'DeX' mf banned from steam. 

Thank You,
Phoenix RL
Sorry to hear about your troubles @Phoenix RL, thread moved from technical support to Kerbal Network.
